English.STR_NOWORDLIST: There's nothing here. Go and add a word list now!
English.STR_NOSTUDYCARD: Congratulations, there's nothing more to learn today! Come and see again tomorrow!
English.STR_LBL_SPECIFYNEWWORDISTNAME_TEXT: The name for this word list
English.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_EMPTYCARDNAME: Empty card name. Please give a name.
English.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_REPETITIVECARD: This card name has been already used. Please give another name.
English.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_EMPTYWORDLISTN: Empty word list name. Please give a name.
English.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_REPETITIVEWORD: This word list name has been already used. Please give another name.
English.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CANNOTCREATEC: The card cannot be created. Please check the file path.
English.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CANNOTCREATEW: The word list cannot be created. Please check the file path.
English.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CARDHASASSOCI: The card cannot be deleted. It has associated word lists.
English.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CARD1ISNULL: At least one word list does not specify Card type 1.
English.STR_MSGBOX_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_WARNINGOND: After deleting the word list, all learning records of the words in that list will be lost. Are you sure to do this?
English.STR_MSGBOX_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_NOTFOUNDWO: Word list [%s] in the database is not in Management. Drop it?
English.STR_TXT_PLACEHOLDER_LEGALNAME: Supports underscores, English letters, and numbers (numbers cannot start), up to 10 characters long
English.STR_MSGBOX_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_DELETETHIS: Are you sure that this card no longer requires review?
English.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_CONTINUETOSTUD: All due words has been reviewed. You can try to turn off [Review only] to study new words.
English.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_MISSIONCOMPLET: Congratulation, there are no more tasks today! Come and see again tomorrow.
English.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_INVALIDFILES: At least one file is invalid.

简体中文.STR_NOWORDLIST: 这里啥都没有。快去添加单词表吧！
简体中文.STR_NOSTUDYCARD: 恭喜你，没有更多需要学的了！明天再来看看吧！
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_EMPTYCARDNAME: 空的卡片名称。请起个名称。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_REPETITIVECARD: 此卡片名称已经使用了。请更换个名称。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_EMPTYWORDLISTN: 空的单词表名称。请起个名称。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_REPETITIVEWORD: 此单词表名称已经使用了。请换个名称。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CANNOTCREATEC: 无法创建卡片。请检查文件路径。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CANNOTCREATEW: 无法创建单词表。请检查文件路径。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CARDHASASSOCI: 无法删除卡片。有关联的单词表。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_ERRORDIALOG_MSG_CARD1ISNULL: 至少有一个单词表没有指定卡片1。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_WARNINGOND: 删除单词表后，所有该表单词的学习记录将丢失，确定这么做？
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_NOTFOUNDWO: 数据库中的单词表[%s]并不在管理器中。删除？
简体中文.STR_TXT_PLACEHOLDER_LEGALNAME: 支持下划线、英文字母和数字（数字不可作为开头），且不超过10个字符。
简体中文.STR_LBL_LEARNINGPROGRESSITEM_TEXT: 已学习（今日新，旧）/未学习/到期：
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_QUESTIONDIALOG_MSG_DELETETHIS: 您确定这张卡片无需再复习吗？
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_CONTINUETOSTUD: 到期的单词都复习完了。你可以尝试关闭[只复习]继续学习新词汇。
简体中文.STR_MSGBOX_INFODIALOG_MSG_MISSIONCOMPLET: 祝贺您，今天没有任务啦！明天再来看看吧。
